title: The Fish Road to Constantinople
description: 1066: Normans pillage and butcher their way across a war-torn England. Cedric, the son of an Anglo-Saxon thegn, watches helplessly as his family is murdered and his home burned. Orphaned and hunted by ruthless men he becomes the leader of a band of refugee children searching for peace and security. His journey takes him halfway around the world to the greatest city on earth - Constantinople.
author: Michael Robinson
